src_original: sakausīdyān rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścetaso 'nārakṣā /  akuśalavṛddhikuśalaparihāṇisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //
tgt_original: 謂心不信受、不正思惟、不修德本、不種善行、不造勝業、意不清淨。

src_original: asaṃprajanyaṃ katamat /  kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayā asaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā pravartate /
tgt_original: 謂心下劣、不勤勇猛、意不捷疾。 云何忘念？
